div.title: Hosea
Hosea's family as a symbol
div.verse: The word of Yahweh that came to Hosea son of Beeri during the reigns of Uzziah, Jotham, Ahaz, and Hezekiah, kings of Judah, and during the reign of Jeroboam son of Joash, king of Israel.
div.title: Hosea's wife and children
div.verse: When Yahweh first spoke through Hosea, Yahweh said to Hosea, "Go, marry a prostituteThe Hebrew word refers to a woman characterized by promiscuity and have children with her who will be children of prostitution, because the land is completely unfaithful to YahwehLiterally "prostituting away from Yahweh"."
So he went and married Gomer daughter of Diblaim, and she became pregnant and gave birth to a son for him.

Yahweh said to him, "Name him JezreelJezreel means "God plants" or "God scatters", because in just a little while I will punish the house of Jehu for the bloodshed at Jezreel, and I will put an end to the kingdom of the house of Israel.
On that day I will break Israel's military powerLiterally "bow" in the Valley of Jezreel."

She became pregnant again and gave birth to a daughter. Yahweh said to him, "Name her Lo-RuhamahLo-Ruhamah means "not loved" or "not shown compassion", because I will no longer show love to the house of Israel or forgive them at all.
But I will show love to the house of Judah, and I will save them by Yahweh their God. I will not save them by bow or sword or warfare, by horses or cavalry."
After she weaned Lo-Ruhamah, she became pregnant and gave birth to a son.
Yahweh said, "Name him Lo-AmmiLo-Ammi means "not my people", because you are not my people, and I am not your GodLiterally "I am not 'I am' to you"."
